contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|New Age}} '''[[New Age]]''' is a social and spiritual movement. '''New Age''' may also refer to: * [[New Age communities]], places where people with a New Age lifestyle may live * [[New Age Gaian]], people who use the Gaia hypothesis of James Lovelock spiritually * [[New Age music]], peaceful music for relaxation ** [[Neoclassical (New Age)]], a sub-genre of the above ** [[Andean New Age]], a sub-genre of the above * [[New Age travellers]], a group of people who often espouse New Age practices and philosophies that travels between music festivals and fairs * [[New Age (Velvet Underground song)|"New Age" (Velvet Underground song)]], a song by Velvet Underground * [[New Age (Marlon Roudette song)|"New Age" (Marlon Roudette song)]], a song by Marlon Roudette * [[The New Age (album)|''The New Age'' (album)]], a 1973 studio album by the blues band Canned Heat * [[The New Age (South African newspaper)|''The New Age'' (South African newspaper)]], a South African newspaper that began circulation in 2010 * [[New Age (newspaper)|''New Age'' (newspaper)]], a defunct South African newspaper * [[New Age (Bangladesh)|''New Age'' (Bangladesh)]], a major Bangladeshi newspaper * ''[[The New Age]]'', an early twentieth-century British literary magazine * ''[[New Age Journal]]'', a periodical in the United States * [[The New Age (film)|''The New Age'' (film)]], an art film directed by Michael Tolkin * The New Age, a 1960s US psych folk group featuring [[Pat Kilroy]] == See also == * {{Lookfrom|New Age}} {{disambig}}
